snippet: A Lower Manhattan business improvement group has proposed to create pedestrian-friendly parks in some unexpected locations.
abstract: Hudson Square Connection, Lower Manhattan business improvement group, wants to turn Freeman Plaza, just outside the Holland Tunnel, into a pedestrian-friendly park; plans come amid a rezoning effort, led by Trinity Real Estate, powerful properties arm of Trinity Church, to open up the neighborhood to residential development.
lead_paragraph: A Lower Manhattan business improvement group has proposed to create pedestrian-friendly parks in some unexpected locations.

headline.seo: Park Is Proposed for Holland Tunnel’s Entrance in Manhattan
headline.main: At Mouth of Holland Tunnel, a Vision for an Unlikely Oasis
headline.print_headline: At Mouth of Holland Tunnel, A Vision for an Unlikely Oasis

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
